Package org.jpws.pwslib.crypto

Interface Summary
PwsCipher Interface for a cryptographic algorithm along the Block Cipher blend.
 

Class Summary
BlowfishCipher This class allows to instantiate Blowfish ciphers of different operation modi, conforming to the PwsCipher interface.
CipherModeCBC This class wraps any ECB mode PwsCipher and transforms it into a CBC mode cipher.
CryptoRandom Enhanced random generator for cryptographical purposes.
HashMac This abstract class implements the MD4-like block/padding structure as it is used by most hashes (MD4, MD5, SHA-0, SHA-1, RIPEMD-128, RIPEMD-160, Tiger).
NullCipher This is a neutral cipher, assumed to be of the ECB mode, which performs no alterations to the user data supplied (null operation).
SHA1 SHA-1 message digest implementation, translated from C source code (the origin is unknown).
SHA256  
SHA512  
Test_RandomGen  
TestC_Ciphers  
TwofishCipher This class allows to instantiate Twofish ciphers of different operation modi, conforming to the PwsCipher interface.
